attributes.action: draft a written constitution for approval by the people in a referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To include :

* defined rights and liberties for each citizen
* defined limits to the powers of government and Parliament
* a referendum to replace the heriditary monarchy with an elected “Defender of the Constitution” who will have powers to prosecute anyone in breach of the Constitution including MPs, the PM and Cabinet
* a strong, independent judiciary
* a new electoral system based on proportional representation
* a reorganisation of government to include direct election of the Prime Minister and Cabinet, and abolition of the House of Lords
* mandatory referendums for major decisions such as declarations of war
* an annual referendum to set government budgets
* a referendum on English independence
* a referendum on withdrawal from the European Union
* a mechanism for citizens to propose issues for referendum
* a clause to only allow modifications to the Constitution by referendum
